It provides primitive text rendering.

LabelRef = ref LabelObj

Procs

proc Label(name: string = "Label"): LabelRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Creates a new Label.

Arguments:

  • name is a node name.

Examples:

var text = Label("Label")
